name: Recorio - Proof of Concept
description:
Welcome to Recorio! A small sandbox of sound effects for you to record.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys: Move
Space: Record sounds
1: Play recorded sounds
K: Clear recorded sounds
Mouse: Point microphone

This was made for an audio production class I took in Fall of 2021. It is based off an idea that I've had for a while. Maybe I'll finish that idea and turn it into a full game? Maybe not? Who knows! Either way, I hope you have fun poking around this little world.

- Talon
